long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make it simple to get your notifications with Empiraa, be in touch with your game plan at all times with our cool Google Chrome Extension.

This extension helps you keep on top of your plan, by seeing notifications at all times.

This is for the Empiraa platform and is there to help simplify you life.
